title: The Triumph of Devotion: Prahlad and Hiranyakashipu

chapters.title: Hiranyakashipu's Ambition
chapters.description: Hiranyakashipu seeks invincibility through a boon from Lord Brahma, aiming to conquer the universe.

chapters.title: Prahlad's Faith
chapters.description: Prahlad, Hiranyakashipu's son, demonstrates unwavering devotion to Lord Vishnu despite his father's disdain for the deity.

chapters.title: Trials of Faith
chapters.description: Hiranyakashipu subjects Prahlad to numerous tests to forsake his devotion, yet Prahlad remains steadfast.

chapters.title: The Divine Intervention
chapters.description: Lord Vishnu appears as Narasimha to protect Prahlad and ends Hiranyakashipu's tyranny, restoring dharma.
